LanguageData.OE_Cultist.title: crimson arachna cultist
LanguageData.OE_Cultist.description: [PAWN_nameDef] as a member of Crimson Arachna Cult has an unwavering faith and the desire to bring their faith to everyone in any way.
LanguageData.OE_Cryptkeeper.title: crimson arachna cryptkeeper
LanguageData.OE_Cryptkeeper.description: [PAWN_nameDef] served as a guardian of forbidden tombs and bio-sealed reliquaries within the Crimson Arachna Cult. Whispered to the dead, catalogued relics, and performed maintenance on what should never be awoken.
LanguageData.OE_Zealot.title: crimson arachna zealot
LanguageData.OE_Zealot.description: [PAWN_nameDef] led bloodlit rituals in the name of the Crimson Arachna Cult. Driven by unwavering conviction, they inspired dread and awe through chanting, fire, and sacrifice.
LanguageData.OE_Herald.title: crimson arachna herald
LanguageData.OE_Herald.description: [PAWN_nameDef] served as a voice of Crimson Arachna Cult, delivering sacred doctrine to fringe worlds through visions, ritual oratory, and whispered revelations. Their words sow both devotion and dread.
